thread.title: Google Wants to Use Drones Too but Not in the Same Way As Amazon
thread.title_full: Google Wants to Use Drones Too but Not in the Same Way As Amazon

title: Google Wants to Use Drones Too but Not in the Same Way As Amazon
text:
Google Wants to Use Drones Too, but Not in the Same Way As Amazon 
Nasdaq Sunday 25th October, 2015 
That's a troubling idea for some, and it has come up against 
heavy resistance from the Federal Aviation Administration. The 
agency has not outlawed ever allowing the online retailer to 
fill the skies with package-carrying mini-delivery planes, but 
it has put a lot of barriers in place that stand in the way of 
that happening. 
Alphabet 's Google also has its own plans for sending drones into 
American airspace, but its latest idea may be much more 
palatable and easier for the FAA to approve. 
What is Google doing?
